name: Stunt Hill
description: Ride a car of the future along the routes with a mass of stunt tricks and jumps. Tachs are equipped with turbo acceleration for overcoming long distances. Keep high speed and reach the finish. In addition to the standard control from the keyboard, you can control the gamepad. The routes are divided into checkpoints.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: XP Процессор: DualCore Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 256mb Место на диске: 60 MB
